Title: euphoria : Behavior and Style Template Library for Windows Phone
HomeWiki:
euphoria is a collection of behaviors for Windows Phone(Mango) application developed in Silverlight.
euphoriaはSilverlightで開発するWindows Phone(Mango)アプリケーションのためのビヘイビア集です。

 euphoria's Behavior

*SaveScreenShotAction
*OpenWebBrowserTaskBehavior
*OpenMediaPlayerTaskBehavior

euphoria's Style Template

*VerticalHeaderPanoramaItemStyle
*(new)MetroRadioButtonStyle
